page.description: Controls in a *[ui:ControlGroup]* container are rendered using a mobile style.

discussion.p: Controls inside a *[ui:ControlGroup]* container are rendered using a style that is common on mobile applications. The *[ui:ControlGroup]* container is typically used in UX Components that users Panels.
The style applied removes the border from the input controls and adds a divider line that separates each control.
